snippet: Police said Sunday that a 29-year-old woman had been raped by a bus driver, a bus conductor and five other men in the north Indian state of Punjab.
abstract: Police said Sunday that a 29-year-old woman had been raped by a bus driver, a bus conductor and five other men in the north Indian state of Punjab.

byline.original: By HEATHER TIMMONS and HARI KUMAR

headline.main: Indian Woman Is Gang-Raped After Bus Ride
headline.print_headline: Indian Woman Is Gang-Raped After Bus Ride
